name: tool_releases
schema: CREATE TABLE `tool_releases` (`created_at` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `download_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `is_latest` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `platforms` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `release_date` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `release_notes` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `sha256` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `tool_id` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `updated_at` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
